meanings.definition: Having the hair hanging down over the forehead.
meanings.sent1: The girl with the forelocked hair looked cute.
meanings.sent2: Her forelocked hair framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's forelocked ears made it look like a little lion.
meanings.sent4: The forelocked branches of the willow tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The forelocked mane of the horse shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To have the hair hanging down over the forehead.
meanings.sent1: She forelocked her hair before going out.
meanings.sent2: He always forelocks his hair when he's nervous.
meanings.sent3: The magician forelocked his hair to add a mysterious touch to his act.
meanings.sent4: The wind forelocked her hair as she stood by the cliff.
meanings.sent5: The model forelocked her hair for the fashion show.
